testcase.name: button clicks trigger correct listener methods
adapter can be instantiated with listener
history item contains comprehensive metadata for torrent content
onBindViewHolder shows media details for video items
torrent history item has comprehensive metadata for re-sharing
history item handles null metadata gracefully
getDisplayTitle returns title or URL fallback

history item contains comprehensive metadata for video content

onBindViewHolder binds video history item correctly
